summary: The FLRAA Production Acceleration Act of 2025 authorizes the Secretary of the Army to expedite the procurement of future long-range assault aircraft (FLRAA) by initiating early production of up to 24 aircraft. The bill aims to accelerate delivery, maintain workforce continuity, stabilize the industrial base, and mitigate cost risks. It mandates a report to Congress detailing the implementation plan, industrial base readiness, and estimated benefits. The act gives special attention to the procurement process, including lessons learned from test results and design updates.
